A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
impressive cinematography\, impressive effects\, but the script is also impressively all over the place and lazy\, I lost concentration several times because the characters are just not interesting. I had to keep dropping my expectation just to finish the film\, but never got me on board\, ended in disappointment. 
it's like a lot of nice trailers pieced together abruptly\, I wouldn't say it's a good movie regardless of the franchise.  

Looking forward to the next one\, hope it would be much better.
